W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After walking through the door, you find yourself in an antiquated city that still uses steam trains. Will anything here help you unravel the mysteries of the triangles?

W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPENING_110_DETAIL.text: Someone who stands out is lurking in your immediate vicinity. Perhaps they know something?

W09_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_STATION_000_DETAIL.text: This ticket lets you ride the tram, but where will it take you?

W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_MOVE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_RADIO_TOWER_MOVE_000_DETAI.text: The retinue of peculiar allies flocking to your side shows no sign of stopping. What will happen next?

W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_SEVEN_MOVE_000_DETA.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_SEVEN_MOVE_000_DETA.text: The ticket you received at the bar is for a coach that will take you all the way to Avalon Yard.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_SEVEN_MOVE_010_DETA.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_SEVEN_MOVE_010_DETA.text: The ticket you received at the bar is for a tram that will take you all the way to the Royal Museum of Albion.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_MOVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_MUSEUM_MOVE_000_DETAIL.text: You received a ticket at the museum, but where will it take you?

W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICE_OFFICE_MOVE_000_DET.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_POLICE_OFFICE_MOVE_000_DET.text: This ticket is for a motorcar, something still very rare in this world.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_SIX_MOVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_SIX_MOVE_000_DETAIL.text: The department store should be your next destination.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DEPARTMENT_MOVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DEPARTMENT_MOVE_000_DETAIL.text: With the puzzle solved, your next destination is the theatre.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DEPARTMENT_MOVE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DEPARTMENT_MOVE_010_DETAIL.text: Since you weren't able to solve the puzzle, your next destination is a shady shop.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPERA_HOUSE_MOVE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_OPERA_HOUSE_MOVE_000_DETAI.text: This will take you back to where you first met the mysterious person.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_FIVE_MOVE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_SQUARE_FIVE_MOVE_000_DETAI.text: This will take you back to where you first met the mysterious person.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_RADIO_TOWER_TRAM_000.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_RADIO_TOWER_TRAM_000.text: The broadcast tower delivers the latest news, stories, and music to the people of Avalon.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SEVEN_TRAM_00.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SEVEN_TRAM_00.text: This is the perfect place to take a load off after a hard day's work.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_MUSEUM_TRAM_000_DETA.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_MUSEUM_TRAM_000_DETA.text: The Royal Museum of Albion allows you to view items that boast the glory of the Kingdom of Albion's past.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_POLICE_OFFICE_TRAM_0.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_POLICE_OFFICE_TRAM_0.text: These are the people responsible for maintaining peace and order in Avalon.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SIX_CARRIGE_0.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_SQUARE_SIX_CARRIGE_0.text: This boutique orders hard-to-get items from all over the world and gathers them in one place.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_DEPARTMENT_CARRIGE_0.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_DEPARTMENT_CARRIGE_0.text: This department store sells only the finest of goods.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_OPERA_HOUSE_TRAM_000.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_OPERA_HOUSE_TRAM_000.text: All of the world's entertainment is gathered here!

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_SQUARE_FIVE_CARRIGE_.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_SQUARE_FIVE_CARRIGE_.text: Sorries is Avalon's most outrageous store.

W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_STATION_COURSE_END_T.speaker: UI
W09_EVAR_BOFO_DUMMY_STATION_COURSE_END_T.text: This is the station where all trains begin and end their journeys.
